#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# List of users (format: username,fullname,groups)
USERS=(
    "alice,Alice Developer,developers,docker"
    "bob,Bob Engineer,developers"
    "charlie,Charlie DevOps,developers,devops,docker"
    "diana,Diana QA,qa"
    "eve,Eve Manager,managers,developers"
)

for user_info in "${USERS[@]}"; do
    IFS=',' read -r username fullname groups <<< "$user_info"
    
    echo "Creating user: $username"
    
    # Create user
    if id "$username" &>/dev/null; then
        echo "  User already exists, skipping"
        continue
    fi
    
    sudo useradd -m -s /bin/bash -c "$fullname" "$username"
    
    # Set temporary password (user will change on first login)
    echo "$username:ChangeMe123!" | sudo chpasswd
    sudo chage -d 0 "$username"
    
    # Add to groups
    if [ -n "$groups" ]; then
        sudo usermod -aG "$groups" "$username"
    fi
    
    # Set password policies
    sudo chage -M 90 -m 7 -W 14 "$username"
    
    echo "  ‚úì Created $username ($fullname)"
done

echo ""
echo "=== User Creation Summary ==="
echo "Created users:"
for user_info in "${USERS[@]}"; do
    username=$(echo "$user_info" | cut -d',' -f1)
    if id "$username" &>/dev/null; then
        echo "  $username - $(id $username)"
    fi
done
EOF

# Database tunnel
Host db-tunnel
    HostName remote-server.com
    User dbadmin
    LocalForward 5433 localhost:5432
    LocalForward 6380 localhost:6379
    ServerAliveInterval 60
    ServerAliveCountMax 3

# Bastion configuration
Host bastion
    HostName bastion.example.com
    User admin
    Port 2222

# Internal servers (via bastion)
Host *.internal
    ProxyJump bastion
    User developer

# SOCKS proxy
Host socks-proxy
    HostName remote-server.com
    User proxy-user
    DynamicForward 9050
    
EOF
